DataElement.preferredName: Participant Personal Medical History Epilepsy Seizure Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The coded response indicating that a patient meets the eligibility criteria with regards to a medical history of seizures.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Participant Personal Medical History Epilepsy Seizure
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Participant medical history - epilepsy/seizure disorder: brain disorder characterized by recurring excessive neuronal discharge, exhibited by transient episodes of motor, sensory, or psychic dysfunction, with or without unconsciousness or convulsive movements.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Someone who takes part in an activity.:A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual.  In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

Concepts.definition: Someone who takes part in an activity.
A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

Property.preferredDefinition: brain disorder characterized by recurring excessive neuronal discharge, exhibited by transient episodes of motor, sensory, or psychic dysfunction, with or without unconsciousness or convulsive movements.

Concepts.definition: A brain disorder characterized by episodes of abnormally increased neuronal discharge resulting in transient episodes of sensory or motor neurological dysfunction, or psychic dysfunction. These episodes may or may not be associated with loss of consciousness or convulsions.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: NINDS:National Institute of Neurological Disorders and Stroke Common Data Element Project
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 5/25/18 - smt CDE transferred to NCIP ownership per NINDS (Muniza Sheikh) request.

The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Does patient have a history o
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have a history of seizures?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have active seizures or a history of uncontrolled seizure disorder, including focal or generalized seizure within the past year?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have active seizure or a history of seizure?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have a history of uncontrolled seizure disorder, including focal or generalized seizure within the past year?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have a history of seizures and has had a seizure in the past 4 weeks or who has not been on stable doses of anti-seizure medicine for 4 weeks?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have active seizure disorder uncontrolled by medication?
